keyFacts: The document is an FBI victim notification form dated December 9, 2009.
It identifies Bradley James Edwards as a victim in case number 72B-MM-111327.
A victim date of October 23, 2009, is recorded in association with Bradley James Edwards.
The form documents basic victim information, including location details (Florida, zip code 33301).
The case IDs referenced (72B-MM-111327 and 188B-MM-105207-C) are marked as 'Pending'.
